oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Finite element approximations to an evolutionary variational inequality with a volterra term
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: NAIR, P
PANI, AK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: numerical-solution
obstacle problem
penalty method
evolutionary variational inequalities
volterra term
penalty method
galerkin approximation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In the first part of this paper, we briefly describe a mathematical model for the simulation of the injection moulding process of a plastic melt into a mould cavity. Using Baiocchi transformation, the problem is transformed into an evolutionary variational inequality with a Volterra term. Based on penalty method, existence, uniqueness and regularity results are discussed. Finally, a finite element Galerkin procedure is applied and a priori error estimates are derived.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: TRENDS IN INDUSTRIAL AND APPLIED MATHEMATICS, PROCEEDINGS,72,317-337
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 1st International Conference on Industrial and Applied Mathematics in Indian Subcontinent,AMRITSAR, INDIA,JAN 22-25, 2001
